quotes.quote: Hugs can do great amounts of good especially for children.
A hug is like a strangle you haven't finished yet.
Once the bear's hug has got you, it is apt to be for keeps.
Hugs may come less frequently from someone with autism but when they do, you know it means everything.
A hug from a samurai girl is warmer than a heap of blankets and more meaningful than a pile of words.
The best gift you can give is a hug: one size fits all and no one ever minds if you return it.
If you hug to yourself any resentment against anybody else, you destroy the bridge by which God would come to you.
A hug delights and warms and charms, that must be why God gave us arms
A kiss without a hug is like a flower without the fragrance.
A hug is like a boomerang you get it back right away.
A hug makes you feel good all day.
Your hug should be more than an embrace of affection. It represents her safety and security. It should make her feel truly loved.
A hug's a happy thing while a shrug's so often destructive.
Everybody needs a hug. It changes your metabolism.
Laughing together is as close as you can get to a hug without touching.
Sometimes the right hug from the right person at the exact right time makes all the wrong in the world disappear.
Millions and millions of years would still not give me half enough time to describe that tiny instant of all eternity when you put your arms around me and I put my arms around you.
Hugs are so vital a thing that there should never be so few of them that you can count the ones you've had.
There's something in a simple hug That always warms the heart, It welcomes us back home And makes it easier to part.
Hugs should be available at the medical stores 24/7. Sometimes, they are the best healers for almost everything.
A hug is worth a thousand words. A friend is worth more.True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it be lost.

Hugging has no unpleasant side effects and is all natural. There are no batteries to replace, it's inflation-proof and non-fattening with no monthly payments. It's non-taxable, non-polluting, and is, of course, fully refundable.
A hug can lift pain and worries from the heart. Bringing hope and love back into the heart.
The only thing to do is to hug one's friends tight and do one's job.
Happiness is a great big hug, hugging us from the inside. allow yourself to feel its warmth and grace
Hugs are nourishment for the heart.
If you hug someone for seven seconds, it gives you a chemical drop in your brain.
No matter how hard you hug your money, it never hugs back.
Sometimes all you can do is hug a friend tightly and wish that their pain could be transferred by touch to your own emotional hard drive.
When you are hugging a child, always be the last one to let go. You never know how long they need it.
When you hug someone, you learn something else about them. An important something else.
Hugs are God's way of reminding us how much we are loved.
If you hug someone goodbye and their response is what the hell are you doing? you may want to examine you're definition of close friend.
A hug is a smile with arms, a laugh with a stronger grip.
A hug is the perfect gift, one size fits all, everyone likes them and no-one cares if it is given back.
We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
A hug is an amazing thing. It's just the perfect way to show the love we're feeling but can't find the words to say.
A hug is a handshake from the heart
